protein.specific_function: Seems to trigger calcium oscillations in mammalian eggs. These oscillations serve as the essential trigger for egg activation and early development of the embryo (By similarity).

pathway.name: Amino sugar and nucleotide sugar metabolism

go_class.description: intramolecular oxidoreductase activity, interconverting aldoses and ketoses
generation of precursor metabolites and energy
